title: Gamification-Enhanced Language Learning Design: Strengthening Flow and Persistence

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners are everyday citizens requiring language use: Needs include gamification for motivation and incremental difficulty progression

learning_goals: Learners perform self-directed learning activities with over 80% frequency in gamification environments
Learners achieve intermediate or higher language proficiency (e.g., TOPIK Levels 3-4) through step-by-step mission completion
Learners maintain interaction frequency with peer learners at least twice weekly through collaborative game activities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
